Interface ChannelRPC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelRequest, org.epics.pvdata.misc.Destroyable, Lockable

    public interface ChannelRPC
extends ChannelRequest
    Requester for channelGet.

    mrk

    • Method Detail

      • request

        void request(org.epics.pvdata.pv.PVStructure pvArgument)
        Issue an RPC request to the channel. Completion status is reported by calling ChannelRPCRequester.requestDone() callback.
        Parameters:
        pvArgument - The argument structure for an RPC request.
